column5: Hey guys, going up to dig lake for walleye opener, 3rd Saturday of May ! How can I find out if the ice is off the lake ?
https://zoom.earth Daily satellite views of the area. Pretty cool site.
Thanks for the tip on that site, prov! Unfortunately, clouds are covering the part I want to see today. Will check it periodically and see what I can see
This is great! Thanks for posting it.
Dog Lake just north of Thunder Bay is frozen solid. Tuesday approximately 30" of ice was still on the lake. Frozen tight right to shore
